name.baseName: Forging ; Forgings ; Natural gas ; Forging billet heating ; All sizes; NESPS2
锻造 ; 锻件 ; 天然气 ; 锻坯加热 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisLimestone/gypsum method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisLimestone/gypsum method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集描述了在所有规模的锻造行业中，使用天然气加热锻件的过程。它包含了针对颗粒物（PM2.5 - PM10）、氮氧化物和二氧化硫等污染物的各种末端管控技术。这些技术包括布袋过滤器、多管和单缸旋风分离器、选择性催化还原(SCR)、选择性非催化还原(SNCR)、低NOx燃烧方法、烟气循环燃烧、氧化/吸收法、以及石灰石/石膏或石灰/石膏方法用于末端污染控制。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码33-37文件，在完整版文件中第956页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是袋式除尘，其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设备耗电量（千瓦时）/(除尘设备额定功率（千瓦）×除尘设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isMulti-tube cyclone dust removal，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是多管旋风，其效率为70，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设备耗电量（千瓦时）/(除尘设备额定功率（千瓦）×除尘设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isSingle cylinder (multiple cylinders in parallel) cyclone，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management60，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是单筒（多筒并联）旋风，其效率为60，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设备耗电量（千瓦时）/(除尘设备额定功率（千瓦）×除尘设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isDirect discharge，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = 1
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是直排，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设备耗电量（千瓦时）/(除尘设备额定功率（千瓦）×除尘设备运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesisSCR，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是选择性催化还原法（SCR），其效率为80，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=工艺废气净化装置耗电量（千瓦时）/(工艺废气净化装置额定功率（千瓦）×工艺废气净化装置运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesisFlue gas cycle combustion，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management50，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是烟气循环燃烧，其效率为50，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=工艺废气净化装置耗电量（千瓦时）/(工艺废气净化装置额定功率（千瓦）×工艺废气净化装置运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesisLow NOx combustion method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management50，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是低氮燃烧法，其效率为50，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=工艺废气净化装置耗电量（千瓦时）/(工艺废气净化装置额定功率（千瓦）×工艺废气净化装置运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是选择性非催化还原法（SNCR），其效率为50，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=工艺废气净化装置耗电量（千瓦时）/(工艺废气净化装置额定功率（千瓦）×工艺废气净化装置运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是直排，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=工艺废气净化装置耗电量（千瓦时）/(工艺废气净化装置额定功率（千瓦）×工艺废气净化装置运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

源文件中描述为为天然气，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered
污染物指标工业废气量的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为工业废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisDirect discharge.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 0.000002S。Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.。.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 0.000002S. Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.
污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是直排，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=工艺废气净化装置耗电量（千瓦时）/(工艺废气净化装置额定功率（千瓦）×工艺废气净化装置运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流原文描述的产污系数为 0.000002S。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisDouble alkali process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 0.000002S。Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.。.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 0.000002S. Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.
